title: Chicken mayonnaise rice salad
ingredients: ['4 skinned and boned chicken breasts, about 125 g (4½ oz) each', '250 g (9 oz) long-grain white rice', 'Salt and black pepper', '½ cucumber, peeled and diced', '150 g (5½ oz) button mushrooms, cut into quarters', '300 g (10½ oz) radishes, cut into quarters', '2 tablespoons chopped fresh chives', '1 teaspoon chopped fresh tarragon', '5 tablespoons low-fat mayonnaise', 'Juice of 1 lemon', 'A few drops of Tabasco sauce', 'A few drops of Worcestershire sauce', 'For the marinade', 'Grated zest of 1 lemon', '2 cloves garlic, crushed', '2 tablespoons olive oil', 'Juice of ½ lemon']
